name: Prismadale (Peas_N_Carrots)
description:
arrows - move (you can double jump)

z - main attack / pass text

x - special attack

Unlock 12 unique attacks, and use them to fight 6 unique enemies plus a boss. Once you beat 15 enemies, you will get a key to show that you can unlock the ruined shrine. Attack the shrine at the end of a section to unlock the color it contains. Jump on chests 7 times to unlock them and get health. There is no penalty for deaths, so try out lots of things to see what fighting style works for you!

Music credits:

Menu music: Medieval Market - Fantasy & World Music by the Fiechters (YouTube)

Game music: Black Wolf's Inn - Fantasy Music (YouTube)

SFX: Royalty Free Sound Effects: Magic Spells, Buffs and Attacks - Sound Spark Chase
